attributes.action: Put a hold on council tax.
attributes.additional_details:
So people can afford to look after there families and feed them.
If schools do go ahead and close family are going to be needing alot more in there cupboards,fridges ect.
attributes.background: Stop council tax in this pandemic.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/303274

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
